profile.headline: Engineering Leader | Tech Lead | Principal Engineer

about: Software engineering leader with over {{years_count:2006}} of experience, building scalable products from concept to market and contributing to open-source communities with libraries like @cheprasov/jsbt. I specialize in highload architectures, end-to-end delivery, and mentoring, ready for global remote roles or relocation.
requirements: British citizen with full UK work rights, open to remote work globally and relocation for the right opportunity.

experiences.title: Senior Software Engineer
achievements: Implemented architecture design and technology selection for core trading platform features.
Implemented complex business logic for Orders and Trades, enhancing platform scalability.
Architected internal services and refactored legacy code for maintainability.
Developed advanced React components and Chrome extensions to improve UI and workflows.
Optimized database performance and E2E tests for faster issue detection.
Contributed to team knowledge sharing and best practices in performance, TypeScript, React, and GraphQL.

experiences.title: Founder & Technical Lead (Entrepreneurial Side Project)
experiences.description: HouseHub.uk is a property listing platform for the UK market, launched as an MVP and actively developed to enhance features, supporting 77,048 active property listings and 264,902 archived (sold or withdrawn) as of October 2025.
achievements: Architected and built a scalable web platform from concept to MVP, owning frontend and backend development.
Scaled MVP to handle huge active listings, driving significant market engagement.
Designed a robust architecture with TypeScript, Node.js, and MySQL for high-volume property data.
Optimized database queries for fast property search and high user traffic.
Managed servers infrastructure with Docker and Nginx for seamless deployment.
Developed REST APIs and third-party integrations for real-time property data.

experiences.title: Founder & Technical Lead (Entrepreneurial Side Project)
experiences.description: Licensed-Sponsors-UK.com monitors UK sponsor licenses for visa holders, achieving 76K active users and 68K new users in 90 days (October 2025), with 2.6M events and 3m 34s average engagement.
achievements: Single-handedly built a service to monitor and notify users about UK sponsor license changes.
Designed a high-performance backend with TypeScript, Node.js, PHP, and MySQL.
Developed automated data scraping and validation for real-time updates.
Created a responsive, accessible frontend with HTML, CSS, and TypeScript.
Managed the full project lifecycle, from requirements to deployment.
Optimized database and APIs for scalability and data protection compliance.
Drove user growth: 76K active users, 2.6M events in 90 days (October 2025).

experiences.title: Principal Software Engineer
achievements: Led process improvements and architecture redesign for trading platform efficiency.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to scope and build new features.
Migrated projects to TypeScript and optimized React/Node.js applications.

experiences.title: Senior Software Developer
achievements: Optimized architecture and code for a scalable holiday search platform.
Mentored developers on JavaScript/TypeScript performance best practices.
Developed React components and microservices with Go-lang for user session data.
Refactored legacy code and improved performance for mobile users.
Reviewed and improved project architecture and code quality.
Simplified complex algorithms to enhance platform performance.

experiences.title: Senior Software Developer
achievements: Led development of Cloudshelf.ai, driving it to successful launch.
Coached junior developers and conducted code reviews.
Optimized applications for low-end Android devices and browsers.
Built data visualization tools and React components.

experiences.title: Senior Software Developer
experiences.description: Badoo is the largest dating network, serving 370M users across 190 countries.
achievements: Designed scalable database architectures for highload features.
Contributed to AI-based photo lookalike search service.
Implemented GDPR compliance and A/B tests.
Developed proxy service and user profile features.

experiences.title: Senior & Full-Stack Developer (Earlier Roles)
experiences.company: Currency Solutions, Topface, StarLine, M2C, Freelance
experiences.description: Developed highload systems and web services across fintech, social networking, and telecom.
achievements: Architected backend systems for highload environments (e.g., Topface: 90M users).
Built REST APIs and frontend applications using PHP, JavaScript, and React.
Integrated billing and GPS-based monitoring systems.

projects.title: @cheprasov/jsbt
projects.subTitle: Developed a TypeScript library for efficient data serialization, surpassing JSON for microservices.
description: Created @cheprasov/jsbt, a high-performance TypeScript library for serializing data, supporting streams, class instances, and circular references.
Optimized for compact size and performance, enabling efficient Node.js-to-browser communication.

projects.title: Open Source Projects
projects.subTitle: Contributed to libraries with significant community adoption.

projects.title: Magnetic Chessboard on Etsy
projects.subTitle: Designed a unique vertical chess set, scaled to a commercial product.
description: Created for personal use, later commercialized: https://www.etsy.com/uk/shop/AlexChess

projects.title: Mazay Mahjong and Bunnies
projects.subTitle: Developed a highload mahjong game for social networks.
description: Built for Facebook and VK: https://apps.facebook.com/mazay_mahjong/
Designed game concepts and architecture, collaborating with artists.

awards.title: JetBrains Open Source Contribution Award
description: Received JetBrains All Products Pack licenses for contributions to open-source PHP projects.

description: Recognized for exceptional dedication and impact.
